description:
The Snowflake Organization Usage Metrics dashboard provides insight into organization-wide data, so you can see key metrics about cost, usage, and storage across all snowflake accounts in one place.

To get started, follow our docs to set up organization usage monitoring in [Snowflake](https://github.com/DataDog/integrations-core/tree/master/snowflake).

For more information about the data collected, view Snowflake's [organization usage docs](https://docs.snowflake.com/en/sql-reference/organization-usage.html).
title: Snowflake Organization Metrics

definition.content:
Use the Organization Usage dashboard to understand your current contractual limits for your organization, consumption by account, and data transfer history from Snowflake into different cloud storage provider's network.

**Note**: By default, the integration minimum collection interval is 12 hours for organization metrics, setting the global dashboard time selector to **past 12 hours or less may result in sparse graphs**.

Snowflake `ORGANIZATION_USAGE` views have a [known latency](https://docs.snowflake.com/en/sql-reference/account-usage.html#data-latency) of 2 to 24 hours, so the integration reports values from the past day.

For more information on setup and use-cases, check out the following:

- [Snowflake integration docs](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/snowflake/)
- [How to setup custom queries](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/snowflake/#snowflake-custom-queries)
- [Blog post on Snowflake monitoring use-cases](https://www.datadoghq.com/blog/snowflake-monitoring-datadog/)

With Datadog's Snowflake integration, you can track key metrics about cost and credit usage at an organization-wide level. In this metric group you can see the hourly credit usage for all warehouses across all the accounts in your Snowflake organization.

definition.title: Credit Usage by Billing Account by Day
Credits Used by Billing Account & Warehouse
Credits Used by Billing Account & Warehouse
Credits Used by Cloud Services by Billing Account & Warehouse
Credits Used by Cloud Services per Warehouse by Day

definition.content: Review your contract info and the effective rates, accounting for any discounts, used for calculating usage for your org based on credits used for all Snowflake accounts in your organization.

You can also view the daily credit usage across all your accounts, including information about the usage from cloud services and the rebates applied to your cloud service usage. Finally, you can see what was actually billed to your account from the previous day given these adjustments.

definition.title: Credits Used for Compute per Service Type
Credits Used for Cloud Services per Service Type
Total Credits Used per Service Type
Credits Adjusted for Cloud Services per Service Type

definition.content: With Datadog's Snowflake integration, you can track the amount of data transferred from Snowflake tables into a different cloud storage provider's network.
